tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE seasonal_demand_trends (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  demand_quantity INT,
  demand_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DemandForecasting (
    forecasting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    threshold_demand INT,
    predicted_demand INT,
    forecast_accuracy VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    season_id INT,
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (season_id) REFERENCES Seasons(season_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Forecasts (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    season_id INT,
    forecast_date DATE NOT NULL,
    forecast_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (season_id) REFERENCES Seasons(season_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    season_id INT,
    trend_date DATE NOT NULL,
    trend_index INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (season_id) REFERENCES Seasons(season_id)
);
